description.message: A WebExtension to quickly open about:* pages.

description_chrome.message: A WebExtension to quickly open chrome://* pages.

description_opera.message: A WebExtension to quickly open opera://* pages.

popup_tooltip_hasQuery.message: Page has alternate options in the context menu.

options_showDisabledButtons.message:
Show privileged pages
(currently canâ€™t be opened from the menu)

page_firefox_.message: Displays version and build information and links to the contributors, licensing information and build configurtion.

page_firefox_about.message: Provides an overview of all about: pages available for your current Firefox version.

page_firefox_accounts.message: Page used by the Sync feature.

page_firefox_buildconfig.message: Displays the configuration and platform used to build Firefox.

page_firefox_cache.message: Displays information about the memory, disk, and appcache.

page_firefox_checkerboard.message: Switches to the checkerboarding measurement page, which allows to detect checkerboarding issues.

page_firefox_config.message: Provides a way to inspect and change Firefox preferences and settings.

page_firefox_credits.message: Lists all contributors to the Firefox project.

page_firefox_crashes.message: Lists all crashes, which happened during the runtime of Firefox (in case the user enabled the crash reporter).

page_firefox_customizing.message: Switches to the customization page, which allows to customize Firefox' UI.

page_firefox_debugging.message: Switches to the Developer Tools debugging page, which allows you to debug add-ons, tabs and Service Workers.

page_firefox_devtools@x2Dtoolbox.message: Shows the content of the devtools.

page_firefox_downloads.message: Displays all downloads done within Firefox.

page_firefox_healthreport.message: Displays performance information of Firefox (in case the user enabled the health report).

page_firefox_home.message: Start page of Firefox when opening a new window.

page_firefox_memory.message: Provides a way to display memory usage, save it as report and run the GC and CC.

page_firefox_mozilla.message: Special page showing a message from The Book of Mozilla.

page_firefox_newtab.message: Start page when opening a new tab.

page_firefox_performance.message: Displays memory and performance information about Firefox subprocesses/add-ons/tabs.

page_firefox_privatebrowsing.message: Start page when opening a private window.

page_firefox_robots.message: Special page showing notes about robots.

page_firefox_sessionrestore.message: Session restoration (displayed after a Firefox crash)

page_firefox_sync@x2Dlog.message: Displays a synchronization protocol related to the Sync feature.

page_firefox_sync@x2Dtabs.message: Lists tabs available for synchronization related to the Sync feature.

page_firefox_telemetry.message: Displays telemetry data collected and sent to Mozilla while Firefox is running (in case the user enabled telemetry).

page_firefox_welcomeback.message: Information page displayed after Firefox is reset.
